plot: Mrs. Smith can't make the stove burn. Bad draught. Crooked stovepipe. Little Lucy toasts her fingers, shivering and unhappy. Papa Smith comes in. Of course he can fix it! Tries. Tries again...
title: Family Troubles
plot_es: Mrs. Smith can't make the stove burn. Bad draught. Crooked stovepipe. Little Lucy toasts her fingers, shivering and unhappy. Papa Smith comes in. Of course he can fix it! Tries. Tries again...
plot_en: Mrs. Smith can't make the stove burn. Bad draught. Crooked stovepipe. Little Lucy toasts her fingers, shivering and unhappy. Papa Smith comes in. Of course he can fix it! Tries. Tries again...
